attributes.action: order the closing of all three UK credit reference agencies for their breaches of the data protection act
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The credit reference agencies Experian, Equifax and CallCredit hold a large amount of sensitive data about each and every UK individual which can affect things such as whether that individual gets a bank account, credit card, loan, and even a home or a job. As such it is imperative that the CRAs comply with the data protection act and verify the authenticity of the data they hold.

Unfortunately they do not and will not do this choosing instead to accept the word of third parties that the data they are being provided is accurate when infact it is quite frequently not.

As such we request the prime minister close the credit reference agencies unless they are able to fully comply with the data protection act

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
